item.title: Mega Millions jackpot hits $1 billion ahead of Christmas Eve drawing
item.description: The Mega Millions jackpot is estimated to be $1 billion -- which would make it the seventh-largest in the game's history.

item.title: Bill Clinton discharged from hospital after 1-day stay
item.description: Former President Bill Clinton has been discharged from the hospital after being treated for the flu, a spokesperson said on Tuesday.

item.title: WATCH: 6-year-old is ecstatic to open 'Uncle Jesse' blanket for Christmas
item.description: Waylen Morrow wants to fly to San Francisco to meet Uncle Jesse, John Stamos' beloved "Full House" character.

item.title: White Christmas forecast: Where snow, ice is expected
item.description: Nine states from Virginia to Maine are under snow alerts on Christmas Eve morning as a band of snow moves through the Northeast, bringing treacherous ...

item.title: WATCH: Girl who prayed for a puppy everyday surprised with a new friend
item.description: Tabitha Grayson surprised her daughter, Georgia, with an adorable puppy while picking her up from school.
